text: On - Tot, kotoryy blagoslovlyayet vas Svoim miloserdiyem, i angely Yego prosyat dlya vas proshcheniya u Allakha i prosyat Yego nastavit' vas na pryamoy put' istiny, chtoby On vyvel vas iz mraka neveriya i zabluzhdeniya k Svetu very i povinoveniya. Allakh - milostiv i miloserden k veruyushchim
